content.rendered:
The  Transfer and Evaluation Center ensures the successful transition of your coursework from your transfer institution to the University of La Verne. We provide you with accurate information in a timely manner while empowering you to make informed decisions about your academic endeavors.

Join the Leo family!

If you are interested in transferring into the traditional undergraduate program, contact an Undergraduate Admissions representative for information on how to become a Leo.

If you are interested in one of our Accelerated Programs for Adults, please contact an admissions representative at our online, La Verne, or regional campuses.

All admission representatives will work with you to explain admission requirements prior to the evaluation of your transfer work.

 

Launch Experience
